title: Impact of the Implementation of IRIS Software for ICD-10 Cause of Death Coding on Mortality Statistics, England and Wales
summary: The differences produced by categorising deaths using MMDS and IRIS software, and the effect on statistics that use cause of death data of using IRIS software.
metaDescription: The differences produced by categorising deaths using MMDS and IRIS software, and the effect on statistics that use cause of death data of using IRIS software.
